website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you need bright light. Otherwise, the Coleman has more to offer.
pros: Has four brightness settings for various lighting needs
cons: The light is a bit harsh and, when used at the highest setting, the battery life is less than half of our best of the best pick

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We have since ordered 6 more of these camping lights. We don't camp. Our basement has no windows and the doors that would offer a light source are not near the basement doors. It is finished living space and with all the lights out you can't see your hand in front of your face. We had a 48 hour power outage and tried these. Still tweaking how we would hang them, place them, but after reading the reviews and choosing these lanterns we were not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Supernana

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a new lantern for camping and since we do rustic camping we really needed something bright. Our last one was bright but it stopped working. I bought this one after reading some reviews. Holy crap, is this thing bright! It has 3 or 4 different settings, so if you don’t want to carry around the sun in a lantern, you can turn it down. Lightweight and seems sturdy. No issues thus far! Might buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ADGun

customer_reviews.title: GREAT light for home emergency usage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for a home emergency. FANTASTIC light and came in quite handy during a recent electrical outage. Lit up the entire living area downstairs making navigation a breeze. Sturdy but not overwhelming in size. Truly is an incredible light from a battery powered lantern.
customer_reviews.author: M. McKee

customer_reviews.title: VERY bright light on highest setting, but battery life only a few hours using rechargeable NiMH
customer_reviews.text: I use adaptors that take 3 AA batteries per D-Cell, so 12 total AA's, and while they gave off VERY bright light on the highest setting, they were noticeably dimmer after only 3 hours, about equivalent to the "Medium" brightness setting. There are 4 brightness settings, and using the 3rd highest setting, "Medium", did give a lot longer life, well over 8 hours before becoming noticeably dimmer. This does not seem to be a lantern that will take a beating or too much rough use, but with prudent handling should last a long time. Can't yet rate the longevity of the LED array, but the unit I received worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Intervine equals Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 products from intervine and are always impressed with the quality and versatility of each. The Internova Monster LED Camping Lantern fulfills all of the promises made in the description. I live in an area that has had frequent power outages in the past and I will keep this lantern for use during the next. When I need another lighting product, I will choose Internova.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with brightness and size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace two 10-year old Coleman battery powered lanterns that required eight D cells each and were not that bright because they used mini florescent tube bulbs. These LED lanterns are so much brighter, take just four D cells, and are still decent sized (i.e., not too small). Don’t know about battery life, but that’s not an issue, these are for power outages (light while my generator gets fired up), and not for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Dane E. Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED Lantern!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! We just had another power outage- very typical in Maine. I already have a couple of LED lanterns however I wanted one that was a little bit stronger so it would illuminate my entire bedroom. this lantern is wonderful it would help the entire room, the batteries were very easy to install, and it appears to be of excellent quality. Great value highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aldengal

customer_reviews.title: Handy to Have in Times of Power Outages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's lightweight and takes only 4 D batteries. Cannot really rate how long the batteries last as I've just received the product a few days ago. Having emergency lighting available (and a choice of brightness) is wonderful. If you need only a little bit of light, you've got it and the batteries should/would last longer as a result. Makes sense to have one or more of these available for potential power outages. Also, living in Florida with possible hurricanes, this is an essential item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Graphique

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: It certainly is bright but otherwise was designed to be disposable a one use item. Why. Well fitting the battery door back on bent the battery springs and sheared the plastic nubs off the centering post. Have to duct tape it on. Very poorly desgned battery compartment, difficult to close and wrecks the battery door when trying to close. Bright light but a waste of money. Don't buy. Theres a card in the box that says to contact the company if there are any problems, but for the time and going to ups to ship back, this product just isnt worth it. I will go to hardware store for something better in design.
customer_reviews.author: febequ

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lantern because it was the brightest lantern I could buy that was battery operated. I needed to use it in a parking lot for an event in our local mountain park. The parking lot does not have any lighting. I needed light for people to be able to find the transport vans and be out of traffic. This worked great! Had the lantern on high for over 4 hours. Stayed bright the whole time and I didn't have to change the batteries. I really like how this lantern worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Zee

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: this came in real handy, (when hurricane Mathew killed the power for 3 days) I'm still using the same set(4 D-cells) of batteries. I like this thing so much I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: steve bobbitt

customer_reviews.title: More than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This lantern is insanely bright! Im using the Internova batteries. I do alot of camping and my house is subject to frequent power outages. This is a great addition to my gear. On high mode it will light up the house during a power outage. Low mode (1 or2) is perfect for in a tent. I will be getting a second one just for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: We gave several of these to our grown children and ourselves to update our preparedness supplies. It was a great Father's Day gift for our grown sons. We all appreciate having the various levels of light, and that it is light weight to carry. Be sure when you order that you specify to put it in an Amazon box because we received ours in the manufacturer's box which had been dented alot during transit. It doesn't present well as a gift when the box is dented.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great camping / emergency lantern. Light weight, portable. For size and weight constraints they could have made it a little smaller for the ease of putting in a pack. Not sure on battery life, have not run it to it's full potential yet. Great little light for the money. Wish they would have choose another battery besides D cell.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright! 360 lighting. Has multiple brightness levels. Looks durable. New to me so battery life is not tested. Not water proof. Has a hanging handle. So far EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: Musician

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: We wanted lamps that took regular batteries to use for emergency lighting when the power goes out and that could be hung up if needed. This lamp has 2 hooks, the main carry handle and a smaller one that pulls out of the bottom. Bright enough. The 1,000 watt seems like overkill. And it can be dimmed several levels.
customer_reviews.author: skareht

customer_reviews.title: Yeti 800 Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a lot of lanterns we decided on the Yeti 800 and couldn't be happier. The company is great, the shipping is fast and the lantern works great. I like that it only takes four D cell batteries the highest setting is really bright also it has four settings so you can lower the brightness if you want to. As you can see I love this lantern
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Little Latern
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these and they actually came in handy the other night when we lost power for 30 minutes. Even at the max setting the battery will last over 2 hours, but you really don't need to go above setting 2. I am overjoyed to have found these. Our last lantern had to be charged and still wasn't as bright as this one! Plan to purchase a couple more of these wonderful lanterns!
customer_reviews.author: RoniBopShop

customer_reviews.title: Close to Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern. It is super bright, has long battery life, and is easy to use. It's certainly bright enough to fill a large room with light. It seems really durable. Also, it has a hook on the bottom, which allows you to hang multiple lanterns from a single hook (though I can't imagine my family needing that much light). Two cons (maybe): It is a little larger than I expected and it blinks once when it is set down on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ebenezer

customer_reviews.title: What a great lantern
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 80-year-old mother and she is not easy to please, but she absolutely loves this lantern. The brightness settings are great and she is so happy to be able to sit in her garage (which is quite dark) while she drinks her rum and smokes her cigarettes. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Light output is great but the collapsible hook broke the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company has since reached out to me and resolved the issue even though I was past the amazon return window. The lamp has been great so far and the company's customer service was outstanding! I was a bit torn on this lantern when I ordered it. Light output is great but the collapsible hook broke the first time I used it. Unfortunately I hung it on the inside of my tent. Add the weight of the lantern plus the four Dcell batteries wasn’t very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: not just for camping
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and we have hurricanes and heavy T-Storms here with power failures. My handyman actually used it today in lieu of a flashlight, he loved it. No need to hold it! So versatile, I even use it outside walking at night in my gated community.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: When batteries are fresh, it's nice and bright. Unfortunately it drains the batteries quite quickly. Bought it strictly for light when the power goes out.
customer_reviews.author: DJCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Was putting batteries in about 30 minutes before I left immediately and the lamp broke IMMEDIATELY leaving me stuck without a lantern for a week. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: adr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is simply amazing. I stopped packing my propane lantern in camping trips bc of this little light. It’s brighter, lighter, and best of all you can use it inside your tent without the threat of combusting yourself
customer_reviews.author: Samuel norris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LANTERN!
customer_reviews.text: Live in the mountains and California. Between the brownouts and the power outages in the California Gold Country, lanterns are a must. Went through 1 brownout in the 8 weeks I have lived here and am told there will be power outages this Winter due to snow. Feel comfortable having a couple of these lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our daughter who lives in the mountains and often looses power. She loves it. She can read when the power goes out!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light, super fast setup! I love a lantern that makes obvious what size of batteries it needs and how to place them properly. And as an arthritis patient, I found this lantern to have an easy way to load the batteries. I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wride

customer_reviews.title: bright light without the weight
customer_reviews.text: I really like this powerful light. It is very light for the amount of bright light it has. For the size and great features it is reasonably priced and arrived quickly when I ordered it. I like it better than my old but reliable similar lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light on the highest setting. So far it seems like a quality light. The nice thing is that have a few settings for your liking. Battery life seems really good as well. I use it for camping and it’s been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Security Lantern...Ideal Size and Features!
customer_reviews.text: Whether a power outage, storm, outdoor events, patio, or camping this is a great solution. 4 levels of brightness, 1 control knob simple, sturdy construction and great price point. Uses 4 D batteries and gives hours of dependable light. 5 Star Product
customer_reviews.author: D Buffington

customer_reviews.title: BLINDED by the Light!
customer_reviews.text: This light is a monster with the amount of light it puts out, really bright. Read the instructions, especially the part that tells you to not look directly into the light. You will see spots for a few minutes if you do, I did. I didn't read that part until later on. Overall this is a great light for blackout purposes or in a tent. Well worth the cost. It's a main part of my emergency disaster home and car bug out kit and should be in yours too.
customer_reviews.author: Broadwing

customer_reviews.title: Love this lantern
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything you want in a lantern, although the 4 D batteries cost nearly as much as the lamp. It’s a great emergency lamp during hurricane season. Remove batteries when not in use to,prevent corrosion forming in the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.  Good Value.  Fast Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: In uncertain times, we always talk about "keeping the lights on." But if our large providers of electricity start to have problems with delivery, it's always good to have a light to read by. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Merk

customer_reviews.title: This lantern is very bright.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp puts out a lot of light. It has 4 levels of brightness. I look forward to using it when camping. It only uses 4 D batteries which is half what most lanterns use. This makes the lantern lighter and easier to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Jane

customer_reviews.title: Really  bright  camping  lantern
customer_reviews.text: Lantern was very bright...even on medium brightness, it lights a large tent; on bright it lights up a whole camp site well. Weight was modest...we hung it from the top of our tent.
customer_reviews.author: teamminsky

customer_reviews.title: Brightness
customer_reviews.text: Haven't got to use it yet due to the heat here in Oklahoma, but I purchased it when we fish at night in he boat. I tried it in my closet with the door closed, whoa- it is bright-just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Just a dreamin’

customer_reviews.title: I have looked around for quite awhile for a solar ...
customer_reviews.text: I have looked around for quite awhile for a solar lamp, but this one need four D batteries. I wanted something that could give me light when electricty goes off. 800 lumens!! Nonetheless, I can buy rechargeable batteries and purchase a solar battery charger. This is rugged and very well built. YES, I sent information about this latern to abourt 30 others.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough to see in a 10 x 10 tent or room.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to light a 10 x 10 canopy for the Walkertown, NC craft fair after is gets dark. It is bright enough to clearly see all the soaps and plants for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bertine

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for power outages and it’s got a long battery life and is super bright. It’s a little heavier than I thought it would be but if you just set it somewhere it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Super bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: We had power outages three times in one week and this lantern was a lifesaver. The handle permitted me to take it between rooms so that had had the bright light wherever I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: The light was bright until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: The light seemed fairly good, but then it abruptly stopped working completely. It just shut off and wouldn't come back on to spite putting new batteries in. The seller gave me a free replacement. that said, I wouldn't trust the seller to always do that -- they're just trying to prop up their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: This light is the brightest light ever ! It has a hanger so you can use it in many ways. Great for camping. I bought one for my daughter and then I had to have one too !
customer_reviews.author: Pam P.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright little lantern
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this lantern for any great length of time, but am impressed with how bright it is. It is easy and intuitive to operate and can be adjusted for several brightness levels.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY !  (BOUGHT 2)
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THESE ON AMAZON, AND THEY ARE REALLY NICE. BRIGHT LIKE A REGULAR ROOM LIGHT, YOU CAN READ A BOOK, OR ANY DETAILED ACTIVITY THAT REQUIRES A REGULAR INDOOR LIGHT WITH THESE !
customer_reviews.author: Saul Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light - very functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light - very functional. We use this as a backup light at home/if the power goes out. Could easily hang it from a ceiling fan and light up a large room.
customer_reviews.author: jtwork

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderful during a power outage
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful during a power outage. Very surprised at how bright the light was how light weight and that it had a way to hang it on a limb or a hook. Highly highly highly recommend yes
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Clear Clean Light
customer_reviews.text: Great light from this lantern, and you're able to adjust the brightness with a click. Takes 4 "D" batteries that seems to need to be changed often if you use everyday. Easy to open to replace the batteries. Lightweight, and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: Good light source for emergency use.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a good amount of light and duration for occational use around the house. It is more compact than the older style camp lanterns and uses standard D cells batteries. (easier to store and you don't have to make sure the charge is full when weather warning come.) Cost was reasonable .
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this lamp in case we lose power during bad weather. It produces a lot of light which can be adjusted. More importantly the manufacturer stands 100% behind their product. We had a defective lamp shipped initially and seller promptly replaced it . Great customer service. Highly recommend both seller and product
customer_reviews.author: nanonano

customer_reviews.title: Great for loss of electricity
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in the brightness for my basement, but then I lost electricity for over 24 hours & it was perfect for the living room in total darkness!
customer_reviews.author: the Doatster

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: brightness settings are perfect from a soft light glow to super bright. Lit up our camp sight so well had other people going on amazon to buy one
customer_reviews.author: Misty Tencza

customer_reviews.title: This is a monster
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for home emergency. I inserted the batteries and switch it on. The brightness is so intense that only medium to high will be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: V. Yue

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but worked ONLY 1 time
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the lateen! He likes to catch fish at night it’s perfect! But yes but it worked only 1 yes only 1 time!!! Changed batteries and still won’t work!!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I tell you what. I purchased this for camping and it is a great light. It is BRIGHT! I only used it for inside my tent and it worked great. Has four different light settings. I highly recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Regina L Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A bit costly (hence the star deduction) but it works as intended and man is it bright. Bought this for power outages and haven't been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I love it other than needing to duck tape bottom
customer_reviews.text: I love this item other than the bottom being created very weird. The springs broke that connect the battery. But ill have to duck tape to keep bottom on it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ACTUALLY BRIGHT ENOUGH TO READ WITH ALL EVENING!
customer_reviews.text: Really bright! Actually bright enough to read with all evening! Batteries last two or three evenings. Rugged construction. Nothing replaces electricity but this is next-best!
customer_reviews.author: The Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Oh I love this sooo much
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this sooo much! It lets off amazing light! definitely feel prepared for camping and when the power goes out!
customer_reviews.author: Shanagain

customer_reviews.title: Great compact lantern
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small camping lantern. You pick how much light you want. Small, compact and it even hangs. Great little light.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin Slone

customer_reviews.title: Bright 360 light
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and weight. Easy to load batteries and carry. Bright light for any application and controlled lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Camping Lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great camping lantern. Good quality. Lightweight. Several options for hanging in tent. Nice and bright. Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, very bright but has many bright settings for what you need and good value especially if your power gets knocked out
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap that broke after struggling to close it!
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is a piece of crap! Don't buy it!!!. I put batteries in anb tried and tried to get it screwed closed. After 30 minutes working with thi piece of crap is broke sp now I am out $50! I had to throw I in the garbage. I am just sick. Thats a damn lot of money to throw away . DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monster Lantern
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good shape and is very bright! Will see how long batteries last. Will use in storage unit and if power goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing light
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a lantern so bright.I bought this cause hurricane season is here in florida. I put all my lights out,tv and computer and it was pitch dark .I lit the lantern and i thought i had turned on a regular lamp. This will be amazing in a blackout. Im thinking of buying one more. Just dont look into the highest settings or you will see dots before your eyes for a few min.lol Im very impressed
customer_reviews.author: bonnie hoyle

customer_reviews.title: Internova Yeti 800 Monster LED
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how bright the lantern was once powered on. Extreme brightness! Took it on our camping trip and it helped us greatly! Anyways the item was as described! Fast shipment and delivery!
customer_reviews.author: mulcahyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Yeti quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lantern. Bought it for my mom who lives where power outages occur in the winter. She was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Colgate- Walcom

customer_reviews.title: A great emergency piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Goes through the batteries fast on high power. On low power batteries last a long time. A very pretty and useful lantern
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Yeti lantern is great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Yeti products. We have had several power failures lately and this worked great. In addition I had a broken bone so I just wheeled this around in the basket of my knee scooter. Worked great and great light.
customer_reviews.author: VaLady

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, brilliantly bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping since it can hang or set on the ground and it has four levels of brightness. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: I love it. When bad weather come to my town and the lights go out it gives me great light.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen James

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright
customer_reviews.text: This LED Lamp is bright. It can be dimmed manually with the switch. For blackouts or camping. Uses 4 D batteries and not rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Les W

customer_reviews.title: Highest light setting is very bright
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lantern and have just starting using it. So, my assessment of battery life is projected.
customer_reviews.author: Auntoftwelve

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, they both failed to work. Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one that worked fine. I then decided to purchase another. It arrived, and it did not work with new batteries installed. Returned it an ordered another. It didn't work either. I give up. Won't order another. It arrived with the box in very bad condition. It literally look like someone throw it against a wall. Won't order another one, eve
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lantern. I plan to get a couple more
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. It's very bright with different levels of brightness. Awesome lantern. I plan to get a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: FRED E. Roddy,  Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put in batteries - nice & bright - easy to operate... not only hoping we dont need to use it!
customer_reviews.author: L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright Bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lantern. Easy to use. Light weight. Most importantly, very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This works well in a black out. Enough light to light up the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: classy qm

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT..REALLY BRIGHT LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Another power outage this week... (stormy weather) ... and this lamp did not disappoint with its monster glow. luv it.
customer_reviews.author: watts

customer_reviews.title: I got a dud
customer_reviews.text: I took it out if the box as soon as I received it. I put new batteries in it. It flashed once and then never came on again on any setting. I tried other new batter and got same result. I am exchanging it for same product because hopefully I just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper

customer_reviews.title: This lantern fills my need for bright light if a  hurricane cause my power and lights.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for hurricane preparedness. I live in South Florida and needed a bright and safe lantern that will light a large space.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Suhr

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a YETI product....read closely!!
customer_reviews.text: Cool light. Works well and is pretty tuff. Misleading advertising. This is not a Yeti product as the ad leads you to believe. Don't get fooled!! Over all I'm happy with the lantern,just not the quality or the name I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light!! We use it during a power outage, let up the living room like it was day time.
customer_reviews.author: guadalupe estrada jr

customer_reviews.title: bright light
customer_reviews.text: check the charge often, I don't use batteries so I always keep it charged
customer_reviews.author: Sid Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this light for power outages. Works great brightens up whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Y.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Really bright, three different levels. We live in an area where we sometimes have power outages. This lantern is security!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life depends on D cell or rechargeable d cell
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this item. Battery life only depends on your d cell batteries. its nice and bright. 10 star in my book
customer_reviews.author: Julie Steinhauser

customer_reviews.title: Brightness
customer_reviews.text: Lights up a full room for 5 1/2 hour power outage.... outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Gordon G. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and four modes!
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright and having four modes of brightness is really nice. Perfect size and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This unit throws off a LOT of light. No negatives to report. Too new to rate battery life....
customer_reviews.author: Phil McNally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect during power outage
customer_reviews.text: This is much brighter than the one I ordered from another supplier. The price is also reasonable. I also love the 4-function brightness modes (low-medium-high-maximum). Surely, a must-have especially when there's power outage. Go and order one today!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Marapo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting source
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lantern for the price. Provides bright lighting for emergencies or camping. Easy to hang or place on any surface. Durable and sturdy enough to withstand most conditions. Plan to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's better and  safer than candles
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's bright, light weight and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Lonnett

customer_reviews.title: Best all around
customer_reviews.text: Affordably priced, lightweight and easy to use. What more cold you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: JWG

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: we love this lamp, gives us great light when the lights go out from snow storms.....will be buying more in the future.....
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Leveque

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Nice & bright but can be put to a lower/softer light. Perfect for games on the table when camping. I just don't like messing with my white gas or propane latterns. I got 2 and will get more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific lamp. Liked it so much I purchased 2 additional ones
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice N Brite !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for power outages in my home. I dont go camping,
customer_reviews.author: velocity01

customer_reviews.title: The top handle appears to be reasonably sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Really bright light, but it is adjustable. The hook on the bottom of the lantern is very weak . I turned the lantern in my hand, and the hook separated from the lantern. Luckily the lantern itself was not damaged. The top handle appears to be reasonably sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Andersen

product_meta.title: Internova Monster LED Camping Lantern - Massive Brightness with Both Battery and Rechargeable Models - The Perfect LED Lantern for Hurricane - Camp - Emergency Kit
feature_bullets: 🚨 BE PREPARED FOR WIDE-SCALE POWER OUTAGES - Protect your family and prepare for any type of medical emergency or pandemic with the brightest and longest lasting lanterns available.

🔥 MASSIVELY BRIGHT - Looking for something to illuminate any creatures that go "bump in the night"? Look no further than the Internova Monster LED Lantern! With a brilliant 800 - 1500 maximum lumens output, this monster light can illuminate a campsite, a trail or even a backyard patio. Simply put, the best led lantern to light up the night.

🔥 INCREDIBLE DURABILITY - Unlike any other camping lantern in its class, the Internova Monster LED is built to weather the elements. Rugged terrain or rain is no match for this lantern. Designed for stability and water-resistance, the sturdy, rubber and plastic molded base can handle slippery, uneven surfaces.

🔥 SUPREME PERFORMANCE - Up to FIVE full hours of non-stop, cool-running, Tri-Strip LED lighting gives dependable safety in emergencies. High, Medium High, Medium and Low modes are simple to change to extend run time whether you are braving a power outage from a hurricane, or riding out a thunderstorm in a tent.

🔥 ADAPTABLE - Lightweight and portable. The ergonomic top handle fits comfortably in your hand so you won't drop the lantern while running from Sasquatch. And the built-in retractable base hook allows the Internova Monster to hang reliably inverted from a tree, hook, tent pole, or stand.
